2.text:
Approximally 6 hours ago a major disaster struck
We don't quite know yet what caused it

3.text:
The main engines were taken out, 
The ship suffered major structural damage

4.text: The extent of the damage is currently being assesed

5.text:
In the meantime we were sent out
in hopes of finding survivors

6.text: Sadly our search hasn't been all too succesfull

start.text: Allright, so here's what we know
